participant_1.background:
I am slightly overweight due to my erratic eating habits.
I am happy to be with my family, even if they are all grown up.
i played football in college.
My family and I have a close bond because we've been through a lot together.
i like books about trains.

participant_2.background:
I am proud of my long curly hair, and the fact that I own a home.
I'm looking forward to having more free time now that my siblings are older.
I play the piano because it allows me to express myself creatively and connect with others.
my sister is a published author.
my favorite color is black.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking.
Me too, I'm glad to hear that.
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read and play sports.
Nice! I play piano and love to read.
Oh cool! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially enjoy historical fiction and mysteries.
Oh, I love historical fiction too! I'm not a big fan of mysteries, though.
I guess I just don't find them very suspenseful or interesting.
To each their own! What's your favorite book?
It's hard to say, but I'd have to say The Book Thief by Markus Zusak.
Oh, I've heard good things about that book! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a really good book.
Well, it sounds like we have a lot in common. I'm glad we met!
Me too! It was nice talking to you.
